results.text: You laugh off the feeble attempt to scare you. Regaining 1 Fortune Point in the process
You are shaken but still in the fight. If another frightened roll is needed add a +4 to the roll.
Fight or flight, but no one told your legs. You cannot move until your next turn.
You back away from what's causing the fear up to 120ft.
Catatonic shock sets in. Spend the remainder of your next turn taking no actions. Just standing, staring, and drooling.
Bowels erupt prematurely, making you the butt of everyone's jokes for the next [[1D6]] days. Take a -1 penalty to your Attitude S.T.A.T.S. and lose 2 Fortune Points.
The fear is so intense it causes you to instantly vomit bright green pea soup. Spend the next [[1D4]] turns taking no action but to puke.
Flee you fools - time to GTFO. You flee the room as fast as possible (straight line to the nearest door/exit) taking attacks from enemies you come within 5ft of.

The source of your fright causes you to skip your next [[1D6]] turns as you become more paralyzed by fear. Gazing at the unknown also gains you 1 @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.MP8G8pm2rVgrwPf3]{Madness} point.

Self flagellation. Dealing normal damage to yourself the pain snaps you out of the fear, but you gain 2 @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.MP8G8pm2rVgrwPf3]{Madness} points.

The fear drives you to attack the enemies of the thing that is causing you the scare. On a failed [[/save resolve]] you attack your allies. In addition to the saving throw you gain 3 @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.MP8G8pm2rVgrwPf3]{Madness} Points.

The horror you witness can no longer be. You gouge your eyes from your sockets, permanently blinding yourself. Gain [[2d6]] @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.MP8G8pm2rVgrwPf3]{Madness} points.
